# Jade Edwards

British

Jade Edwards (born 31 March 1990 in Ascot) is a British racing driver and Television presenter currently co presenting ITV4's live coverage of the British Touring Car Championship. Edwards is known for previously competing in the British Touring Car Championship, driving for One Motorsport. Edwards has previously competed in the Renault Clio Cup UK, British GT Championship and the Ginetta Junior Championship, and made her BTCC debut in 2020. She is the daughter of 2000 Renault Clio Cup UK champion Jim Edwards Jr. and granddaughter of Jim Edwards Sr. Jade is the first 3rd generation BTCC driver.
